channel.title: General Help for First Time SCAR Scripting
channel.description:
I had just recently realized the potential of the SCAR program. Many of you are rather incredible scripters and I would like to know how to do a few things.
1) How do I press 'enter' in a script? In the game I am currently trying to build a script for, I have to hit the enter key first in order to chat.
2) How do I press the 'shift' key in a script while also holding the up arrow. So it would be a 'shift-up arrow' combo.
If any of you could help me out, that would be great.
Thank You.

item.title: General Help for First Time SCAR Scripting
item.dc:creator: @Ron Ron
item.description:
@Ron wrote:

  1. Here is the code for doing a shift/up arrow combo.
program ShiftUpArrow_Combo;
begin
  ClearDebug;  // Clears Debug window.
  KeyDown(16); // Holds down Shift key.
  KeyDown(38); // Holds down Up Arrow key.
  Wait(1000);  // Wait for 1 second.
  KeyUp(38);   // Releases the Up Arrow key.
  KeyUp(16);   // Releases the Shift key.
end.

~Ron

Read full topic
item.source: General Help for First Time SCAR Scripting

item.title: General Help for First Time SCAR Scripting
item.dc:creator: @Hex_Key Hex Key
item.description:
@Hex_Key wrote:

  1. If you have downloaded SRL, the funtion TypeSend() autmatically presses enter key to send the text after it has typed whats in the ().
    If you dont have SRL use the normal SendKeys with chr(13) put into your string.

Hope i helped

Read full topic
item.source: General Help for First Time SCAR Scripting
